H0.text: Heat energy is the type of energy transmitted from the Sun to Earth through space.

H1.text: Kinetic energy is the type of energy transmitted from the Sun to Earth through space.

H2.text: Electrical energy is the type of energy transmitted from the Sun to Earth through space.

H3.text: Electromagnetic energy is the type of energy transmitted from the Sun to Earth through space.

A4.text: Electromagnetic Waves from Maxwell's Equations on Project PHYSNET
